attributes.action: PREVENT MASS LOSS OF URBAN TREES & HEDGEROW, Action: Climate Change Prevention by CREATING a UK Education Programme -
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown.
 
Please create an educational campaign to promote the value of Hedgerow & Trees in Urban areas. Let people know the impact losing it will have if we continue to disregard its value on Climate Change.
 
CONCERNS:
- That we are at a tipping point with nature in the UK. 
- Losing birds, bees & flowers 
- This will affect us in the long run & our food chain & ecology/ climate change
-  I’m very concerned about the lack of knowledge.
- The widespread concreting going on to create parking & ease – do we have to loose all hedges & trees to do this?
-  This leaves us ALL vulnerable to flooding too.  A disaster the last couple of years.
 
ACTION VALUE:
**This is a small action (preserving hedgerow, trees and gardens 'best we can') which IS something small that ALL PEOPLE CAN FREELY CHOOSE TO DO.
** IT WILL HELP TO PREVENT CLIMATE CHANGE & GLOBAL WARMING.  
** IF EDUCATED & SHOWN WHAT THE EFFECTS OF DESTROYING IT HAS. 
We can all help our carbon footprint.
 

We the undersigned agree,
We need more education, promotion / campaign / action on the government’s part, to educate & make this a priority.
We can create space without cutting down & concreting. 
We need to let people know the difference they could make.
